tool.name: GATK4 CallCopyRatioSegments
tool.description: - Calls copy-ratio segments as amplified, deleted, or copy-number neutral
tool.command: @CMD_BEGIN@ CallCopyRatioSegments #if $calling_copy_ratio_z_score_threshold: --calling-copy-ratio-z-score-threshold $calling_copy_ratio_z_score_threshold #end if #if $gatk_config_file: --gatk-config-file $gatk_config_file #end if #if $gcs_max_retries: --gcs-max-retries $gcs_max_retries #end if --input $input #if $neutral_segment_copy_ratio_lower_bound: --neutral-segment-copy-ratio-lower-bound $neutral_segment_copy_ratio_lower_bound #end if #if $neutral_segment_copy_ratio_upper_bound: --neutral-segment-copy-ratio-upper-bound $neutral_segment_copy_ratio_upper_bound #end if #if $outlier_neutral_segment_copy_ratio_z_score_threshold: --outlier-neutral-segment-copy-ratio-z-score-threshold $outlier_neutral_segment_copy_ratio_z_score_threshold #end if --output $output #if $use_jdk_deflater: $use_jdk_deflater #end if #if $use_jdk_inflater: $use_jdk_inflater #end if #if $verbosity: --verbosity $verbosity #end if

param.name: calling_copy_ratio_z_score_threshold
param.label: Calling Copy Ratio Z Score Threshold
param.help: Threshold on z-score of non-log2 copy ratio used for calling segments.

param.name: gatk_config_file
param.label: Gatk Config File
param.help: A configuration file to use with the GATK.

param.name: gcs_max_retries
param.label: Gcs Max Retries
param.help: If the GCS bucket channel errors out, how many times it will attempt to re-initiate the connection

param.name: input
param.label: Input
param.help: Input file containing copy-ratio segments (.cr.seg output of ModelSegments).

param.name: neutral_segment_copy_ratio_lower_bound
param.label: Neutral Segment Copy Ratio Lower Bound
param.help: Lower bound on non-log2 copy ratio used for determining copy-neutral segments.

param.name: neutral_segment_copy_ratio_upper_bound
param.label: Neutral Segment Copy Ratio Upper Bound
param.help: Upper bound on non-log2 copy ratio used for determining copy-neutral segments.

param.name: outlier_neutral_segment_copy_ratio_z_score_threshold
param.label: Outlier Neutral Segment Copy Ratio Z Score Threshold
param.help: Threshold on z-score of non-log2 copy ratio used for determining outlier copy-neutral segments. If non-log2 copy ratio z-score is above this threshold for a copy-neutral segment, it is considered an outlier and not used in the calculation of the length-weighted mean and standard deviation used for calling.

param.name: use_jdk_deflater
param.label: Use Jdk Deflater
param.help: Whether to use the JdkDeflater (as opposed to IntelDeflater)

param.name: use_jdk_inflater
param.label: Use Jdk Inflater
param.help: Whether to use the JdkInflater (as opposed to IntelInflater)

data.name: output
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: output tabular
data.help: Output file for called copy-ratio segments.

tool.help:
Calls copy-ratio segments as amplified, deleted, or copy-number neutral.
This is a relatively naive caller that takes the modeled-segments output of ModelSegments and performs a simple statistical test on the segmented log2 copy ratios to call amplifications and deletions, given a specified range for determining copy-number neutral segments. This caller is based on the calling functionality of `ReCapSeg <https://gatkforums.broadinstitute.org/gatk/discussion/5640/recapseg-overview>`__.
If provided ModelSegments results that incorporate allele-fraction data, i.e. data with presumably improved segmentation, the statistical test performed by CallCopyRatioSegments ignores the modeled minor-allele fractions when making calls.
Input ~~~~~
- Copy-ratio-segments .cr.seg file from ModelSegments. This is a tab-separated values (TSV) file with a SAM-style header containing a read group sample name, a sequence dictionary, a row specifying the column headers contained in CopyRatioSegmentCollection.CopyRatioSegmentTableColumn, and the corresponding entry rows.
Output ~~~~~~
- Called copy-ratio-segments file. This is a tab-separated values (TSV) file with a SAM-style header containing a read group sample name, a sequence dictionary, a row specifying the column headers contained in CalledCopyRatioSegmentCollection.CalledCopyRatioSegmentTableColumn, and the corresponding entry rows.
Usage example ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::
gatk CallCopyRatioSegments \ -I tumor.cr.seg \ -O tumor.called.seg
